function_call.name: classify_technology
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_technology":[{"name":"regular cleaning equipment such as merv-13","category":"Surface cleaning","confidence":"High"},{"name":"decontamination systems","category":"Advanced disinfection systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"surface disinfection systems","category":"Advanced disinfection systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"automated sanitation equipment in food production and processing facilities","category":"Automated sanitation equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Advanced disinfection robots","category":"Advanced disinfection systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Uv-c sanitation","category":"Advanced disinfection systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Using uv germicidal irradiation","category":"Advanced disinfection systems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Remote monitoring of traditional cleaning practices","category":"Hygiene maintenance tools","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Fumigation","category":"Advanced disinfection systems","confidence":"High"}]}
